repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:10-alpine

RUN apk add git=~2.20 python=~2.7 make=~4.2 g++=~8.3 --no-cache

WORKDIR /app

COPY ./package.json ./yarn.lock /app/

RUN yarn install && yarn cache clean;

COPY . ./

RUN yarn build

ARG GIT_COMMIT
RUN test -n "$GIT_COMMIT"
ENV GIT_COMMIT="$GIT_COMMIT"
LABEL git_commit="$GIT_COMMIT"

CMD ["yarn", "start"]
